Function reference

epiparameter classes

epidist object

Class constructor, validator, and methods

epidist()
Create an epidist object
discretise()
Discretises a continuous distribution in an epidist object
family(<epidist>)
Family method for the epidist class
format(<epidist>)
Format method for epidist class
plot(<epidist>)
Plots an epidist object
print(<epidist>)
Print method for epidist class
validate_epidist()
epidist class validator

epiparam object

Class constructor, validator, and methods

epiparam()
Create an epiparam object
`$<-`(<epiparam>)
Set accessor for epiparam class
format(<epiparam>)
Format method for epiparam class
head(<epiparam>) tail(<epiparam>)
head and tail methods for epiparam class
`names<-`(<epiparam>)
Set names on epiparam class
print(<epiparam>)
Print method for epiparam class
`[`(<epiparam>)
Subsetting method for epiparam
summary(<epiparam>)
Summary method for epiparam class
validate_epiparam()
epiparam class validator

vb_epdist object

Class constructor, validator, and methods

vb_epidist()
Create a vb_epidist object
format(<vb_epidist>)
Format method for vb_epidist class
plot(<vb_epidist>)
Plots an vb_epidist object,
print(<vb_epidist>)
Print method for vb_epidist class
validate_vb_epidist()
vb_epidist class validator

Accessors

Get data from epi classes

get_citation()
Method for extracting citation information from <epidist> or <epiparam> objects.
get_parameters()
Parameters method for epidist object

epidist helper functions

Functions to help construct <epidist> objects

create_epidist_citation()
A helper function when creating an epidist object to create a summary statistics list with sensible defaults, type checking and arguments to help remember which summary statistics can be accepted in the list A helper function when creating an epidist object to create a citation list with sensible defaults, type checking and arguments to help remember which citation information is accepted in the list.
create_epidist_metadata()
Specify metadata associated with data set
create_epidist_method_assess()
Specify whether certain methodological aspects have been used when fitting the distribution
create_epidist_region()
Specify the geography of the data entry
create_epidist_summary_stats()
Specify any reported summary statistics for epidist
create_epidist_uncertainty()
Specify distribution parameter uncertainty

epidist from {epiparameter} library

Retrieve <epidist> object directly from database

epidist_db()
Create an epidist object(s) directly from the epiparameter library (database)

Explore epiparam

List epi parameters as table

list_distributions()
List epidemiological distributions stored in an epiparam object

Distribution functions

Functions for operating on <epidist> and <vb_epidist> distributions

density(<epidist>) cdf(<epidist>) quantile(<epidist>) generate(<epidist>) density(<vb_epidist>) cdf(<vb_epidist>) quantile(<vb_epidist>) generate(<vb_epidist>)
PDF, CDF, PMF, quantiles and random number generation for epidist and vb_epidist objects

Parameter extraction

Extract distribution parameters from summary statistics

extract_param()
Calculate the parameters of a parametric probability distribution from reported values of percentiles, or median and range

Parameter conversion

Converts distribution parameter to summary statistics and vice versa

convert_gamma_params()
Converts the parameters of the gamma distribution to summary statistics
convert_gamma_summary_stats()
Converts the summary statistics to parameters of the gamma distribution
convert_geom_params()
Converts the parameters of the geometric distribution to summary statistics
convert_geom_summary_stats()
Converts the summary statistics to parameters of the geometric distribution
convert_lnorm_params()
Converts the parameters of the lognormal distribution to summary statistics
convert_lnorm_summary_stats()
Converts the summary statistics to parameters of the lognormal distribution
convert_nbinom_params()
Converts the parameters of the negative binomial distribution to summary statistics
convert_nbinom_summary_stats()
Converts the summary statistics to parameters of the negative binomial distribution
convert_weibull_params()
Converts the parameters of the Weibull distribution to summary statistics
convert_weibull_summary_stats()
Converts the summary statistics to parameters of the Weibull distribution
gamma_meansd2shapescale()
Converts the mean and standard deviation of the gamma distribution to the shape and scale parameterisation.
gamma_shapescale2meansd()
Converts the shape and scale parameters of the gamma distribution to the mean and standard deviation.
geom_mean2prob()
Converts the mean of the geometric distribution to the probability parameter
geom_prob2mean()
Converts the probability parameter of the geometric distribution to the mean (expectation) of the distribution
lnorm_meanlogsdlog2meansd()
Converts the meanlog and sdlog parameters of the lognormal distribution to the mean and standard deviation
lnorm_meansd2meanlogsdlog()
Converts the mean and standard deviation of a lognormal distribution into the standard parameterisation of meanlog (mu) and sdlog (sigma)
nbinom_meandisp2probdisp()
Convert the mean and dispersion (k) parameter of the negative binomial distribution to the probability (p) and dispersion parameters.
nbinom_probdisp2meandisp()
Convert the probability and dispersion (k) parameters of the negative binomial distribution to the mean (expectation) and dispersion parameterisation
weibull_meansd2shapescale()
Converts the mean and standard deviation of the Weibull distribution to the shape and scale parameterisation.
weibull_shapescale2meansd()
Converts the shape and scale parameters of the Weibull distribution to the mean and standard deviation

Calculate parameters from summary statistics

Uses either extraction or conversion function to get distribution parameters

calc_dist_params()
Calculates the parameters of a probability distribution from a list of available summary statistics

Epi object conversion

Convert between {epiparameter} classes

as_epidist()
Converts rows of an epiparam object into an epidist object
as_epiparam()
Converts an epidist object to an epiparam object

Epi object checking

Check an object is of a certain type or feature

is_epidist()
Checks whether the object is an epidist
is_epidist_params()
A helper function to check whether the vector of parameters for the probability distribution are in the set of possible parameters used in the epiparameter package
is_epiparam()
Checks whether the object is an epiparam
is_truncated()
Check if distribution in epidist is truncated
is_vb_epidist()
Checks whether the object is a vb_epidist
is_parameterised()
Checks whether or object contains a distribution and parameters for that distribution.

Bind to epiparam

Add entries to object

bind_epiparam()
Bind an epi object to an epiparam object
cbind_epiparam()
Bind columns to an <epiparam> object

Cleaning

Standardises name of disease or epidist object

clean_disease()
Standardises the names of diseases
clean_epidist_name()
Standardises the names of epidemiological distributions

Check valid parameterisation

Check parameters are valid for <epidist>

possible_epidist_params()
Helper function that prints the distribution parameters accepted by epiparameter

Utility function

calc_disc_dist_quantile()
Calculate the quantiles of a probability distribution based on the vector of probabilities and time data (e.g. time since infection)
